articles.title: European Super League: Big Six among nine of founding members who commit to UEFA - Sky Sports
articles.description: Nine of the original Super League clubs - including the Premier League's 'Big Six' - have declared their commitment to UEFA.

articles.description: Nine of the original European Super League clubs - including the Premier League's 'Big Six' - have declared their commitment to UEFA and its competitions at continental and domestic level.
articles.content:
Nine of the original European Super League clubs – including the Premier League's 'Big Six’ – have declared their commitment to UEFA and its competitions at continental and domestic level.

articles.title: The Super League Founders Are Now at War With One Another - The New York Times
articles.description: Real Madrid, Juventus and Barcelona are threatening to extract damages from their former partners in a doomed European Super League.
articles.content:
The defections left teams in Spain and Italy acknowledging the league was no longer viable in its original form, but not formally declaring they would not try to revive it.
